page.title: 12Housing.
page.content: In Kyleakin houses are mainly made of stone but some are of wood.The oldest houses have been standing since the eighteen hundreds so they are drafty and have been installed with windows. Some of the houses have been made into flats so that two people can live in the one house.Some of the houses have been built all on one floor for the old people.Most of the houses are semi_detatched but the houses which were built about two years ago are beside each other but all different sizes they are called terrace houses. Quite a lot of houses are bed breakfast houses and will take in tourists,hikers or any people on holiday.In the summer some tents are put up at the sides of the football pitch.
